main event: A report from Project Blue Book detailing an observation of 5-10 spherical objects with silver white color and vapor trails over Holyoke, Massachusetts on 2 October 1955.
interesting points: The objects were observed criss-crossing, stopping, and making sharp turns., The sighting lasted from 0532 until the objects were still in sight., There were multiple conclusions drawn, including possibly being aircraft or balloons., Analysis was expedited due to limited information., The visibility was excellent, and binoculars were used for observation.
